name: Intro
commands: Ugh my feet are killing me...
Oh quit whining, we're finally here|This is Greshia, 2nd largest city in the kingdom.|MC I don't think teacher ever took you here right?
Nah, he only ever took me east really.|You seem like you know this place well Senya.
Well before I was taken in by teacher...|Back when I was with my caravan...|We used to stop by here pretty often.
Ow! Schuri what was that for?
For making Senya have to bring up bad memories you dolt.
Not like I meant to do it...How was I supposed to know?
Thanks Schuri.|But MC is right, not like he meant to do it or knew.|Just has a habit of it.
...Besides, I actually have fond memories of the place.|There's a tavern where everyone often visited.|..That's about as good of a place as any to start for this 'Aesc'

No...I know the owner and it'll be easier on my own.|Why don't you two ask some of the residents?|There should be pretty good shops here.|Pick up some gear for the rest of the journey.|When you two are ready I'll be waiting at the tavern."
Well....Schuri do you know Greshia well? Or are we both new here.
My father has taken me here a couple of times...|My father was considering an arranged marriage to one of the lords' sons.|I would have had to quit my studies but...
Teach right? I was teach's last pupil so I only know some of the story|But he's got some high up power|He probably pulled some strings right?

Indeed... Sir Cyrus requested to continue teaching me as he saw potential for me to become a high sage.|Truthfully I think he was lying to keep me safe...|I've always been told I had talent... but a high sage?|I'm not capable of that.

...|Schuri I may be a magical failure but anyone can tell you're meant for great things|Teach was a good man, I think he saw this as an opportunity for you to achieve great things|...and get you away from some creepy noble.
...was Sir Cyrus' last lesson on how to cheer me up?|...Thanks you dummie.
Gotta make sure I stay on your good side|That punch on the top of my head feels like its swelling|You could at least pull your punches|....Oh yeah, hey Schuri?
I mean...you're the daughter of a noble right?|I thought you were supposed to be taught to talk all fancy|and behave like a proper noble and all that.
Bend down again so I can show you what its like when I don't pull my punches|I think whatever I did to your empty head wore off.
Welp...|Uh hey I'm gonna head to the shops first then see ya bye!|
That idiot!|I swear I'll...ugh|time to ask the locals I guess.
